rev.desc.rev.desc: only validate whether taget field is defind as key.
validate auto complete performance in comfill widgets
changed fdisp and rio panels to use mixed case descriptions

The user can now do a validate fields on a format that doesn't have a file associated with it, and it will no longer associate the file to the format. The user may still use the "file" option to associate the file if desired. Validate will work normally for formats that already have a file associated with them. Changed it so there is an "OK" button instead of only pressing enter when prompted for a file name. Also changed end to cancel on same screen to be more consistant.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

descript.descript: only validate whether taget field is defind as key.
validate auto complete performance in comfill widgets
changed fdisp and rio panels to use mixed case descriptions

The user can now do a validate fields on a format that doesn't have a file associated with it, and it will no longer associate the file to the format. The user may still use the "file" option to associate the file if desired. Validate will work normally for formats that already have a file associated with them. Changed it so there is an "OK" button instead of only pressing enter when prompted for a file name. Also changed end to cancel on same screen to be more consistant.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
